setup_script_description: sets focus on a link after the form landmark, and hides the 'Bottom' link and 'Add Contact' button
task: navigate backwards to a text input inside a form landmark
specific_user_instruction: With focus on the 'Navigate backwards from here' link, navigate to the 'Phone' text input.
output_assertions: Name of the group, 'Add Contact', is conveyed
Name of the input, 'Phone', is conveyed
The ability to enter text into the input is conveyed
